[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1633683583305{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tour style=”modern” shape=”round” color=”blue” controls_size=”sm” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”About” tab_id=”1633683567470-5b0a7e35-f43b” el_class=”list-3″][vc_custom_heading text=”About Hostel” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:24|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1633936903115{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]Anna University Regional Campus – Tirunelveli, provides a second home namely “Pothigai Hostel” for boys and “Thamirabarani Hostel” for girls. It has well embarked facilities so that the girl students can stay safe and feel homely. The hostel is provided with all the necessary facilities which provides a peaceful environment to study. There are ample of airy spaces where the students can socialize in comfort with their fellow inmates and other recreational facilities. The occupancy ratio is 6: 1 and 8: 1. The hostel rules need to be complied by all without fail.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_gallery type=”image_grid” images=”1084,1083,1082,1081″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Faculty Profile” tab_id=”1633683692324-d0fd92bb-49ca”][vc_text_separator title=”Hostel Staff” color=”custom” style=”double” accent_color=”#dc3545″][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1633685274783{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Rules and Regulations” tab_id=”1633683700340-196a11ec-15de”][vc_column_text]Hostel Rules and Regulations[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Timings” tab_id=”1633683714269-2fe6198a-1cdc”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

Visiting Hours
  • Authorized visitors can visit the hostel inmates for an hour between 10.00 am to 1.00 pm during weekends.

 

Study Timings
  • 6.00 pm to 7.30 pm
  • 9.15 pm to 10.15 pm

 

Mess Timings
  • Morning Tea: 6.00am – 7.00am
  • Breakfast: 7.30 am – 8.30 am
  • Lunch: 12.50 pm – 01.40 pm
  • Evening Tea: 5.00 pm – 5.30 pm
  • Dinner: 7.40 pm – 9.00 pm

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Downloads” tab_id=”1633938610683-78428408-48e4″][vc_column_text el_class=”list-3″]

Leave Forms

  • Outing Leave form
  • Weekend Leave form
  • Working Day Leave form
  • Working Hours Leave form
  • Working Hours Leave form (Academic)
  • Working Hours Leave form (Personal)

 

Hostel Admission and Readmission Forms

  • Hostel Admission Application Form
  • Hostel Re-admission Application Form

 

Visitors Registration Form

  • Visitors Registration Form

 

Hostel Vacating Form

  • Hostel Vacating Form – Hostel Dues Clearance
  • Hostel Vacating Form – Mess Dues Clearance
